Uses of Class
fast3d.math.Viewmode

  • Packages that use Viewmode 
    Package Description
    fast3d.math  

    • Uses of Viewmode in fast3d.math

      Fields in fast3d.math declared as Viewmode 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Viewmode CameraMode.viewmode
      the cameras viewmode
      for GET-access please use getViewmode()
      Methods in fast3d.math that return Viewmode 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Viewmode CameraMode.getViewmode()
      should be used instead of direct access to the field because enums can be null and the viewmode should have a valid value -not null-
      if the viewmode field contains null it will be set to Viewmode.PERSPECTIVE as requested by the Viewmode doc and then the value is returned
      static Viewmode Viewmode.valueOf(java.lang.String name)
      Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
      static Viewmode[] Viewmode.values()
      Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.
      Constructors in fast3d.math with parameters of type Viewmode 
      Constructor and Description
      CameraMode(Viewmode vm, boolean m_nIC, boolean m_o, boolean m_iS, boolean wf)
      constructs a new camera mode with the given parameters
